answers.answer: I'll b 35 week tomorrow and I'm fed up.  I ask my doctor if I can deliver early and he said no.  I was upset lol.

Im samr. Keeo having bleeds. Lost plug jus want her here. An contracting but still closed :( never been so fed up its my 3rd bubba im so ready now thinking to try birthing ball in couple weeks or somthing that will help xx
I'll be 37 weeks on Friday..... I am sooooooooooooo ready!!!! 2nd and final kiddo..... I'm so sick and tired of being tired and sore!!! Good luck ladies!
Awww i said that now on 3rd    but defo my last xx

This will be my first and only child, thankfully my husband supports this.38w 3d..Sooo over this pregnancy.When I started this journey, I did not know what I was in for...(Rant coming)Gestational Diabetes is the worst.Super strict diet,what times a day to eat -scheduled meals,testing your blood all the time,insulin,exercise -which I usually don't mind, but we have between 30-35 degrees every day.. it's bloody hot! I just can't get out and about as much as I am supposed to..It cools down nicely at night, but that's when baby is active the most and sleeping is nearly impossibleMy feet and ancles are so swullen I can't tell where my legs ends and where my ancles/feet starts..Sharp needles and shooting pains comes with it too :(Putting my feet up does help, but my doctor has specificly asked me not to, as my baby's position is sunny side up and I need to sit leaned forwarded to assist baby to move into a better position.So not so great for my poor feet.Then there are some other common issues I am not comfortable talking about as well.Everything is just too much.Only to add to my misery I have this night caught a massive cold and as I have Gestational Diabetes, they will start my labor within 10days and I worry that I don't have enough time to recover from my cold...I take comfort in knowing that it is soon over.. but every day is a struggle and I feel a bit low..
Awwww i feel for you hun. Nearly their now hun not too much longer xx

question: 35weeks in wednesday having real fed up....anyine else same... or just me moaning!! Lol
title: 35 weeks this week and fed up of beung preggers...
